Package gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Data mapping between the Domain Model and VistA instances.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VistaPatientDao
    Data Access Object for VistA Patients.
    VistaPersonDao
    Data Access Object for VistA Persons (i.e., users).
    VistaProcedureCaller
    An object that can call VistA Remote Procedures.
    VistaSurgeryDao
    Data Access Object for VistA Surgery package objects, particularly risk calculations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RpcVistaPatientDao
    Implementation of VistaPatientDao using remote procedures.
    RpcVistaPersonDao
    Implementation of VistaPersonDao using remote procedures.
    RpcVistaSurgeryDao
    Implementation of VistaSurgeryDao using remote procedures.
    VistaOperationResult
    Encapsulates the common VistA operation result pair of a machine-friendly code and human-friendly status message.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemoteProcedure
    Enumerates all VistA Remote Procedures which this application uses.
    VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode
    Enumerates the possible responses from VistA for saving a risk calculation note.

Package gov.va.med.srcalc.vista Description

Data mapping between the Domain Model and VistA instances. Various DAOs (Data Access Objects) provide a the API for this data mapping.

All DAOs are Java interfaces with a corresponding Remote Procedure-based implementation. The interfaces exist to facilitate mocking for integration tests.

Although our VistA integration technology is VistALink, the code in this package is not specific to VistALink. All VistALink-specific code is contained in the gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink sub-package.
